sense.def:
Equally
pomeni, da je nekaj po delih, količinah ali prostoru enake velikosti kot vsi drugi.

seg.quote: On his death the land was divided equally between them.

sense.def:
Equally
pomeni tudi enake stopnje ali razsežnosti.

seg.quote: He was a superb pianist. Irene was equally brilliant.
Are parents meant to love all their children equally?

sense.def:
Z besedo
equally
napovemo pripombo, ki uravnovesi drugo ali je nasprotna drugi, pravkar izrečeni pripombi.

seg.quote: Each country must find its own solution to unemployment. Equally, each must find its own way of coping with inflation.
